pkgmetadata.longdescription: This program attempts to exploit WebDAV enabled servers by: - attempting to create a new directory (MKCOL) - attempting to put test files of various programming langauges (PUT) - optionally attempt to put files with .txt extension, then move to executable (MOVE) - check if files executed or were uploaded properly - optionally upload a backdoor/shell file for languages which execute Additionally, this can be used to put an arbitrary file to remote systems.
